mapper.select: select t.id as id, t.class_type as classType , t.type as type, t.money as money, t.create_user as createUser, t.create_time as createTime from outpay t
select t.id as id, t.class_type as classType , t.type as type, t.money as money, t.create_user as createUser, t.create_time as createTime from outpay t where t.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into outpay (class_type, type, money, create_user, create_time) values (#{classType}, #{type},#{money},#{createUser},#{createTime})
mapper.update: update outpay set class_type = #{classType}, type=#{type}, money=#{money}, create_user=#{createUser}, create_time={createTime} where id=#{id}
